abstract: Former Major League Baseball pitcher Ted Lilly is charged in California with three counts of felony insurance fraud.
lead_paragraph: The former Major League Baseball pitcher Ted Lilly has been charged in California with three felonies related to insurance fraud.
snippet: The former Major League Baseball pitcher Ted Lilly has been charged in California with three felonies related to insurance fraud.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Pitcher Is Charged in Fraud Case
